snippet: The tax summary for Thomas C. Foley released by his campaign showed that he effectively paid no federal income tax for the third straight year.
abstract: Connecticut gubernatorial hopeful Thomas C Foley's 2013 tax forms show that he effectively paid no federal income tax for the third straight year; Foley's wealth has been subject of attacks by incumbent Democratic Gov Dannel P Malloy.
lead_paragraph: The tax summary for Thomas C. Foley released by his campaign showed that he effectively paid no federal income tax for the third straight year.

headline.main: Foley, G.O.P. Candidate for Connecticut Governor, Paid $673 in U.S. Taxes Last Year
headline.print_headline: Federal Taxes for Candidate With Wealth: $673 in 2013
